DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to test the efficacy of the combination of dye Lutein, Zeaxanthin and brilliant blue to stain the internal limiting membrane as well as the epiretinal membranes during the Vitrectomy surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Association of Lutein, Zeaxanthin and Brilliant Blue in Chromovitrectomy
DOC.detailed_description: Twenty five patients with epiretinal membrane, macular hole or proliferative diabetic retinopathy and indication of vitrectomy surgery will be selected to participate in this study.
DOC.criteria: Patients over 18 years, both gender Diagnosis of epiretinal membrane OR macular hole OR proliferative diabetic retinopathy Indication of surgical treatment for removal of the epiretinal membrane Any history of eye disease glaucoma Eye infection affecting any structure provided eye
